meanings.definition: A group of extinct seed-bearing plants that lived during the Carboniferous period.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study pteridosperms to learn about ancient plants.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of pteridosperms for visitors to see.
meanings.sent3: The pteridosperms in the garden seemed to whisper secrets from the past.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the shadows danced like pteridosperms swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly described the appearance of pteridosperms with detailed illustrations.

meanings.definition: Fossilized remains of pteridosperms have been found in various locations around the world.
meanings.sent1: Paleontologists carefully excavated the pteridosperms fossils from the ground.
meanings.sent2: The discovery of pteridosperms fossils provided valuable insights into ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The children on the dig site pretended to be pteridosperms coming back to life.
meanings.sent4: The layers of rock held the secrets of pteridosperms waiting to be uncovered.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the beauty of fossilized pteridosperms for all to admire.
